title: Nintendo Emulator plus 10783 roms.
description:
Most of you would remember the legendary console Nintendo Entertainment System,which appeared in the early 80 ' .This console sold million pieces and games throughout the world and he was loved insanely jealous of small and large.The torrent includes the latest version of nestopia emulator(the best simulator of nes in my opinion) ,and all the games that have never been to this console! So to remember the old and learn the new!

Instructions:

With the which you extract the self-extracted 7zip file will appear a folder called Nes emulator roms.Open the folder and run the file nestopia.You will open a window with the File menu,Machine,Netplay etc,if you want full screen, you can press the maximize.To run a game you go to file, then open, reasonably after pressing Open will get you in the folder with the roms where there selecting whichever game you want,if you do not automatically go into this folder then you browse and go manually.The controls of the barrier between gamers is the cursor keys(the cross)the fire buttons are the (G,X and the autofires their A,S respectively.The select is the Shift key and the start the Enter.This is it, of course, you can Change by going to Options-Input to original window.

Requirements:

Minimum
Pentium MMX or comparable AMD (1)
Ram 64MB
Video Direct3D 9.0 compatible graphics card
OS Windows 98/Me/ 2000/XP (2)
Software DirectX 9.0c or higher

(1) With this spec will have to wait,nothing but at a snail's pace.
(2) Win98/Me users must acquire the Unicode Layer DLL unicows.dll) from the Microsoft site and placed on the same list with Nestopia.
Recommended
Pentium 4 or comparable AMD
Ram 256MB
Video Direct3D 9.0 compatible graphics adapter
Audio DirectSound 8.1 compatible sound card
OS Windows XP
software DirectX 9.0c or higher

To clarify that the emulator has taster and Window Vista,7,8 (32-bit and 64-bit) and it works fine!
